body_html:
hmmm, this shouldn't be happening. Quadro P3000 has cuda capability 6.1, and we ship our binaries with all the bits for 6.1.

Did you install PyTorch via conda or pip?

If via conda (or pip), what exact command was it that you used?
body_text:
hmmm, this shouldn't be happening. Quadro P3000 has cuda capability 6.1, and we ship our binaries with all the bits for 6.1.
Did you install PyTorch via conda or pip?
If via conda (or pip), what exact command was it that you used?
body:
hmmm, this shouldn't be happening. Quadro P3000 has cuda capability 6.1, and we ship our binaries with all the bits for 6.1.

Did you install PyTorch via `conda` or `pip`?

If via conda (or pip), what exact command was it that you used?
